title: About Me
content:
Hello!

My name is Jackson Duke and I would like to thank you for taking the time to visit my website.

I have worked at HCL Technologies of America Inc. contracted to BNSF since August of 2018.
Here I have had the pleasure of developing company standards regarding RESTful API best-practices and spearheaded the adoption of the OpenAPI 3.1 standard. In addition to aiding in establishing technology policies I have had the pleasure of working as a full-stack developer utilizing Java Spring Boot and Angular for over two years.

I graduated from The University of Texas at Dallas with a BS in computer science on December 16, 2017.

If you would like to get in contact with me, please visit my LinkedIn profile or email me at hireme@jduke.io!
